entities.name: PRInputBundle
entities.risk_of_leakage: low if all downstream queries honor <= cutoff

entities.name: RouteResult artifact
entities.risk_of_leakage: depends on router implementation (should not read post-cutoff)

entities.name: Boundary model artifact
entities.risk_of_leakage: low if cutoff_key is used consistently

entities.name: Pinned repo artifacts (CODEOWNERS/OWNERS/etc)
entities.risk_of_leakage: low (prevents reading repo HEAD), but risk if base_sha is wrong or missing

entities.name: Behavior truth (first_response_v1 / first_approval_v1)
entities.risk_of_leakage: high if accidentally used as a feature; intended only for labels

entities.name: TruthStatus.unknown_due_to_ingestion_gap
entities.risk_of_leakage: medium if treated as negative label instead of unknown
